item.title: Potential Trump tariff refund bill could top $1 trillion as Supreme Court fight looms
item.description: The Supreme Court has not indicated when it might rule on a request by the Trump administration to rule quickly on whether many new tariffs are legal.

item.title: Trump Epstein letter and drawing from 'birthday book' released
item.description: President Donald Trump sued The Wall Street Journal for defamation over its report revealing the existence of the letter to Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Trump loses bid to overturn $83.3 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll defamation case
item.description: Carroll has accused Trump of defaming her in statements denying her accusation that he raped her decades earlier in a New York City department store.

item.title: French prime minister Francois Bayrou ousted in confidence vote
item.description: French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou and his centrist minority government have been ousted in a confidence vote in France's National Assembly on Mond...

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court for emergency order to keep billions of dollars in foreign aid frozen
item.description: The Trump administration asked the Supreme Court for an emergency order to keep billions of dollars in foreign aid frozen.
